body_html: Thanks for your reply. I added .float() and removed the other useless .double() and .float() . Now it works. By the way all those calls where added following errors which were complaining about specific data types.
body_text: Thanks for your reply. I added .float() and removed the other useless .double() and .float() . Now it works. By the way all those calls where added following errors which were complaining about specific data types.
body: Thanks for your reply. I added `.float()` and removed the other useless `.double()` and `.float()` . Now it works. By the way all those calls where added following errors which were complaining about specific data types.
